en: I יהוה am your God who brought you out of the land of Egypt, the house of bondage:
You shall have no other gods beside Me.
he: אָֽנֹכִ֖י֙ יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֶ֑֔יךָ אֲשֶׁ֧ר הוֹצֵאתִ֛יךָ מֵאֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרַ֖יִם מִבֵּ֣֥ית עֲבָדִ֑͏ֽים׃

Deuteronomy 7:9.en: Know, therefore, that only your God יהוה is God, the steadfast God who keeps the divine covenant faithfully to the thousandth generation of those who love [God] and keep the divine commandments,
Deuteronomy 7:9.he: וְיָ֣דַעְתָּ֔ כִּֽי־יְהֹוָ֥ה אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ ה֣וּא הָֽאֱלֹהִ֑ים הָאֵל֙ הַֽנֶּאֱמָ֔ן שֹׁמֵ֧ר הַבְּרִ֣ית וְהַחֶ֗סֶד לְאֹהֲבָ֛יו וּלְשֹׁמְרֵ֥י מִצְוֺתָ֖ו לְאֶ֥לֶף דּֽוֹר׃

en: I יהוה am your God who brought you out of the land of Egypt, the house of bondage:
You shall have no other gods besides Me.
he: אָֽנֹכִ֖י֙ יְהֹוָ֣ה אֱלֹהֶ֑֔יךָ אֲשֶׁ֧ר הוֹצֵאתִ֛יךָ מֵאֶ֥רֶץ מִצְרַ֖יִם מִבֵּ֣֥ית עֲבָדִ֑͏ֽים׃

Genesis 37:24.en: and took him and cast him into the pit. The pit was empty; there was no water in it.
Genesis 37:24.he: וַיִּ֨קָּחֻ֔הוּ וַיַּשְׁלִ֥כוּ אֹת֖וֹ הַבֹּ֑רָה וְהַבּ֣וֹר רֵ֔ק אֵ֥ין בּ֖וֹ מָֽיִם׃

Genesis 37:26.en: Then Judah said to his brothers, “What do we gain by killing our brother and covering up his blood?
Genesis 37:26.he: וַיֹּ֥אמֶר יְהוּדָ֖ה אֶל־אֶחָ֑יו מַה־בֶּ֗צַע כִּ֤י נַהֲרֹג֙ אֶת־אָחִ֔ינוּ וְכִסִּ֖ינוּ אֶת־דָּמֽוֹ׃

I Chronicles 16:10.en:
Exult in His holy name;
let all who seek the LORD rejoice.
I Chronicles 16:10.he: הִֽתְהַלְלוּ֙ בְּשֵׁ֣ם קׇדְשׁ֔וֹ יִשְׂמַ֕ח לֵ֖ב מְבַקְשֵׁ֥י יְהֹוָֽה׃

I Chronicles 16:11.en:
Turn to the LORD, to His might;
seek His presence constantly.
I Chronicles 16:11.he: דִּרְשׁ֤וּ יְהֹוָה֙ וְעֻזּ֔וֹ בַּקְּשׁ֥וּ פָנָ֖יו תָּמִֽיד׃

I Chronicles 16:12.en:
Remember the wonders He has done;
His portents and the judgments He has pronounced,
I Chronicles 16:12.he: זִכְר֗וּ נִפְלְאֹתָיו֙ אֲשֶׁ֣ר עָשָׂ֔ה מֹפְתָ֖יו וּמִשְׁפְּטֵי־פִֽיהוּ׃

I Chronicles 16:13.en:
O offspring of Israel, His servant,
O descendants of Jacob, His chosen ones.
I Chronicles 16:13.he: זֶ֚רַע יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל עַבְדּ֔וֹ בְּנֵ֥י יַעֲקֹ֖ב בְּחִירָֽיו׃

I Chronicles 16:14.en:
He is the LORD our God;
His judgments are throughout the earth.

I Chronicles 16:15.en:
Be ever mindful of His covenant,
the promise He gave for a thousand generations,
I Chronicles 16:15.he: זִכְר֤וּ לְעוֹלָם֙ בְּרִית֔וֹ דָּבָ֥ר צִוָּ֖ה לְאֶ֥לֶף דּֽוֹר׃

I Chronicles 16:16.en:
that He made with Abraham,
swore to Isaac,

I Chronicles 16:17.en:
and confirmed in a decree for Jacob,
for Israel, as an eternal covenant,
I Chronicles 16:17.he: וַיַּעֲמִידֶ֤הָ לְיַֽעֲקֹב֙ לְחֹ֔ק לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל בְּרִ֥ית עוֹלָֽם׃

I Chronicles 16:18.en:
saying,‘To you I will give the land of Canaan
as your allotted heritage.’
I Chronicles 16:18.he: לֵאמֹ֗ר לְךָ֙ אֶתֵּ֣ן אֶֽרֶץ־כְּנָ֔עַן חֶ֖בֶל נַחֲלַתְכֶֽם׃

I Chronicles 16:19.en:
You were then few in number,
a handful, merely sojourning there,
I Chronicles 16:19.he: בִּהְיֽוֹתְכֶם֙ מְתֵ֣י מִסְפָּ֔ר כִּמְעַ֖ט וְגָרִ֥ים בָּֽהּ׃

I Chronicles 16:20.en:
wandering from nation to nation,
from one kingdom to another.
I Chronicles 16:20.he: וַיִּֽתְהַלְּכוּ֙ מִגּ֣וֹי אֶל־גּ֔וֹי וּמִמַּמְלָכָ֖ה אֶל־עַ֥ם אַחֵֽר׃

I Chronicles 16:21.en:
He allowed no one to oppress them;
He reproved kings on their account,
I Chronicles 16:21.he: לֹֽא־הִנִּ֤יחַ לְאִישׁ֙ לְעׇשְׁקָ֔ם וַיּ֥וֹכַח עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם מְלָכִֽים׃

I Chronicles 16:22.en:
‘Do not touch My anointed ones;
do not harm My prophets.’

I Chronicles 16:23.en:
“Sing to the LORD, all the earth.
proclaim His victory day after day.
I Chronicles 16:23.he: שִׁ֤ירוּ לַֽיהֹוָה֙ כׇּל־הָאָ֔רֶץ בַּשְּׂר֥וּ מִיּֽוֹם־אֶל־י֖וֹם יְשׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃

I Chronicles 16:24.en:
Tell of His glory among the nations,
His wondrous deeds among all peoples.

I Chronicles 16:25.en:
For the LORD is great and much acclaimed,
He is held in awe by all divine beings.
I Chronicles 16:25.he: כִּי֩ גָד֨וֹל יְהֹוָ֤ה וּמְהֻלָּל֙ מְאֹ֔ד וְנוֹרָ֥א ה֖וּא עַל־כׇּל־אֱלֹהִֽים׃

I Chronicles 16:26.en:
All the gods of the peoples are mere idols,
but the LORD made the heavens.
I Chronicles 16:26.he: כִּ֠י כׇּל־אֱלֹהֵ֤י הָֽעַמִּים֙ אֱלִילִ֔ים וַיהֹוָ֖ה שָׁמַ֥יִם עָשָֽׂה׃

I Chronicles 16:27.en:
Glory and majesty are before Him;
strength and joy are in His place.
I Chronicles 16:27.he: ה֤וֹד וְהָדָר֙ לְפָנָ֔יו עֹ֥ז וְחֶדְוָ֖ה בִּמְקֹמֽוֹ׃

I Chronicles 16:28.en:
“Ascribe to the LORD, O families of the peoples,
ascribe to the LORD glory and strength.
I Chronicles 16:28.he: הָב֤וּ לַֽיהֹוָה֙ מִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת עַמִּ֔ים הָב֥וּ לַיהֹוָ֖ה כָּב֥וֹד וָעֹֽז׃

I Chronicles 16:29.en:
Ascribe to the LORD the glory of His name,
bring tribute and enter before Him,
bow down to the LORD majestic in holiness.
I Chronicles 16:29.he: הָב֥וּ לַֽיהֹוָ֖ה כְּב֣וֹד שְׁמ֑וֹ שְׂא֤וּ מִנְחָה֙ וּבֹ֣אוּ לְפָנָ֔יו הִשְׁתַּחֲו֥וּ לַֽיהֹוָ֖ה בְּהַדְרַת־קֹֽדֶשׁ׃

I Chronicles 16:30.en:
Tremble in His presence, all the earth!
The world stands firm; it cannot be shaken.
I Chronicles 16:30.he: חִ֤ילוּ מִלְּפָנָיו֙ כׇּל־הָאָ֔רֶץ אַף־תִּכּ֥וֹן תֵּבֵ֖ל בַּל־תִּמּֽוֹט׃

I Chronicles 16:31.en:
Let the heavens rejoice and the earth exult;
let them declare among the nations, “The LORD is King!”
I Chronicles 16:31.he: יִשְׂמְח֤וּ הַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ וְתָגֵ֣ל הָאָ֔רֶץ וְיֹאמְר֥וּ בַגּוֹיִ֖ם יְהֹוָ֥ה מָלָֽךְ׃

I Chronicles 16:32.en:
Let the sea and all within it thunder,
the fields and everything in them exult;
I Chronicles 16:32.he: יִרְעַ֤ם הַיָּם֙ וּמְלוֹא֔וֹ יַעֲלֹ֥ץ הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה וְכׇל־אֲשֶׁר־בּֽוֹ׃

I Chronicles 16:33.en:
then shall all the trees of the forest shout for joy
at the presence of the LORD,
for He is coming to rule the earth.
I Chronicles 16:33.he: אָ֥ז יְרַנְּנ֖וּ עֲצֵ֣י הַיָּ֑עַר מִלִּפְנֵ֣י יְהֹוָ֔ה כִּי־בָ֖א לִשְׁפּ֥וֹט אֶת־הָאָֽרֶץ׃

I Chronicles 16:34.en:
Praise the LORD for He is good;
His steadfast love is eternal.
I Chronicles 16:34.he: הוֹד֤וּ לַֽיהֹוָה֙ כִּ֣י ט֔וֹב כִּ֥י לְעוֹלָ֖ם חַסְדּֽוֹ׃

I Chronicles 16:35.en:
Declare:
Deliver us, O God, our deliverer,
and gather us and save us from the nations,
to acclaim Your holy name,
to glory in Your praise.
I Chronicles 16:35.he: וְאִמְר֕וּ הוֹשִׁיעֵ֙נוּ֙ אֱלֹהֵ֣י יִשְׁעֵ֔נוּ וְקַבְּצֵ֥נוּ וְהַצִּילֵ֖נוּ מִן־הַגּוֹיִ֑ם לְהֹדוֹת֙ לְשֵׁ֣ם קׇדְשֶׁ֔ךָ לְהִשְׁתַּבֵּ֖חַ בִּתְהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃

I Chronicles 16:36.en: Blessed is the L<small>ORD</small>, God of Israel, from eternity to eternity.” And all the people said, “Amen” and “Praise the L<small>ORD</small>.”
I Chronicles 16:36.he: בָּר֤וּךְ יְהֹוָה֙ אֱלֹהֵ֣י יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל מִן־הָעוֹלָ֖ם וְעַ֣ד הָעֹלָ֑ם וַיֹּאמְר֤וּ כׇל־הָעָם֙ אָמֵ֔ן וְהַלֵּ֖ל לַיהֹוָֽה׃ {פ}

I Chronicles 16:8.en:
“Praise the LORD;
call on His name;
proclaim His deeds among the peoples.
I Chronicles 16:8.he: הוֹד֤וּ לַֽיהֹוָה֙ קִרְא֣וּ בִשְׁמ֔וֹ הוֹדִ֥יעוּ בָעַמִּ֖ים עֲלִילֹתָֽיו׃

I Chronicles 16:9.en:
Sing praises unto Him;
speak of all His wondrous acts.

en: יהוה bless you and protect you!
יהוה deal kindly and graciously with you!
יהוה bestow [divine] favor upon you and grant you peace!
he: יָאֵ֨ר יְהֹוָ֧ה ׀ פָּנָ֛יו אֵלֶ֖יךָ וִֽיחֻנֶּֽךָּ׃ {ס}
יִשָּׂ֨א יְהֹוָ֤ה ׀ פָּנָיו֙ אֵלֶ֔יךָ וְיָשֵׂ֥ם לְךָ֖ שָׁלֽוֹם׃ {ס}

en:
Deliver us, O LORD our God,
and gather us from among the nations,
to acclaim Your holy name,
to glory in Your praise.

Blessed is the LORD, God of Israel,
From eternity to eternity.
Let all the people say, “Amen.”
Hallelujah.
he: הוֹשִׁיעֵ֨נוּ ׀ יְ֘הֹוָ֤ה אֱלֹהֵ֗ינוּ וְקַבְּצֵנוּ֮ מִֽן־הַגּ֫וֹיִ֥ם לְ֭הֹדוֹת לְשֵׁ֣ם קׇדְשֶׁ֑ךָ לְ֝הִשְׁתַּבֵּ֗חַ בִּתְהִלָּתֶֽךָ׃
בָּ֤רֽוּךְ יְהֹוָ֨ה אֱלֹהֵ֪י יִשְׂרָאֵ֡ל מִן־הָ֤עוֹלָ֨ם ׀ וְעַ֬ד הָעוֹלָ֗ם וְאָמַ֖ר כׇּל־הָעָ֥ם אָמֵ֗ן הַֽלְלוּ־יָֽהּ׃

Psalms 30:1.en: A psalm of David. A song for the dedication of the House.

Psalms 30:2.en:
I extol You, O LORD,
for You have lifted me up,
and not let my enemies rejoice over me.
Psalms 30:2.he: אֲרוֹמִמְךָ֣ יְ֭הֹוָה כִּ֣י דִלִּיתָ֑נִי וְלֹֽא־שִׂמַּ֖חְתָּ אֹיְבַ֣י לִֽי׃

Siddur Sefard, Weekday Shacharit, Hodu 1.en: Deliver us Adonoy, our God, and gather us from among the nations, to give thanks to Your holy Name— to be extolled in Your praise. Blessed is Adonoy, God of Israel from the world till the next world and all the people said: "Amen, Praise God." Let every soul praise God. Praise God.
Siddur Sefard, Weekday Shacharit, Hodu 1.he: הֽוֹשִׁיעֵֽנוּ יְהוָֹה אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ, וְקַבְּ֒צֵֽנוּ מִן־הַגּוֹיִם לְהוֹדוֹת לְשֵׁם קָדְשֶֽׁךָ, לְהִשְׁתַּבֵּֽחַ בִּתְהִלָּתֶֽךָ: בָּרוּךְ יְהוָֹה אֱלֹהֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, מִן־הָֽעוֹלָם וְעַד הָֽעוֹלָם, וְאָמַר כָּל־הָעָם אָמֵן, הַֽלְ֒לוּיָהּ: כֹּל הַנְּ֒שָׁמָה תְּהַלֵּל יָהּ, הַֽלְ֒לוּיָהּ:
Siddur Sefard, Weekday Shacharit, Hodu 1.heRef: סידור ספרד, שחרית לימות החול, הודו י׳

Siddur Sefard, Weekday Shacharit, Hodu 9.en: Adonoy is King, Adonoy was King Adonoy will be King forever and ever. Adonoy is King, Adonoy was King Adonoy will be King forever and ever. And Adonoy will be King over the whole earth; on that day Adonoy will be One and His Name One.
Siddur Sefard, Weekday Shacharit, Hodu 9.he: יְהוָֹה מֶֽלֶךְ, יְהוָֹה מָלָֽךְ, יְהוָֹה יִמְלֹךְ, לְעֹלָם וָעֶד: יְהוָֹה מֶֽלֶךְ, יְהוָֹה מָלָֽךְ, יְהוָֹה יִמְלֹךְ, לְעֹלָם וָעֶד: וְהָיָה יְהוָֹה לְמֶֽלֶךְ עַל־כָּל־הָאָֽרֶץ, בַּיּוֹם הַהוּא יִהְיֶה יְהוָֹה אֶחָד, וּשְׁמוֹ אֶחָד:
Siddur Sefard, Weekday Shacharit, Hodu 9.heRef: סידור ספרד, שחרית לימות החול, הודו ט׳
